Fields.DestinationPath-Help: The location and filename, i.e. the full path, of the file in Nextcloud.
Fields.File-Help: The file to upload, leave empty to use the current working file.
Fields.SetWorkingFile-Help: Sets the uploaded Nextcloud path as the working file. Use this only at the end of a flow, as this file will be marked as the final output. Any subsequent flow elements requiring the working file will not function as expected.

Nextcloud.Description: A plugin that allows you to upload files to Nextcloud.
Nextcloud.Label: Nextcloud

Fields.Password-Help: The application-specific password you created for FileFlows for this Nextcloud user.
Fields.Url-Help: The URL of the Nextcloud server
Fields.Username-Help: The username of the user to upload to.
